name: Yolko - The Search for Eggcalibur
description:
Yolko - The Search for Eggcalibur was designed as my end of the year project studying at Friends of Design in Cape Town South Africa. 

This game is by no means fully complete as my specialization was in 3D graphics, however, all assets seen in this project are my own with the exception of the Title Screen and Sound.

NOTE: I have heard that for some reason on some computers the players movement speed as well as the rotation speed of some of the other game objects is either very slow or extremely fast. I apologize for this as I had not come across this issue when developing or building the project.
